title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, October 16, 2014
teaser: First up, Amanda Lotz, Associate Professor of Communications Studies at the University of Michigan, and author of "The Television Will Be Revolutionized," talks about HBO’s online only option. Plus, Leslie Horn, a writer for Gizmodo, joins us for a conversation about coming around to the idea of leaving and listening to voicemails after her dad passed away.
